briefTitle: A Study to Assess Efficacy, Long Term Safety and Tolerability of RT001 in Subjects With Friedreich's Ataxia
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Controlled, Phase 2/3 Study to Assess Efficacy, Long Term Safety and Tolerability of RT001 in Subjects With Friedreich's Ataxia
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the Efficacy, Long Term Safety and Tolerability of RT001 in subjects with Friedreich's Ataxia

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline to 11 Months in Maximum Consumption of Oxygen (mlO2/kg/Min) Using Cardiopulmonary Exercise Testing (CPET)
